alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward County through 530 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or 7 miles northwest of Sunrise. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Locations impacted include... Sunrise, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 and Markham Park. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
